content.title: Fuad Al Firoj
content.subtitle: Developer • AI Specialist • CTO • Game Builder
content.body: I’m Fuad Al Firoj — a developer, creative problem solver, and AI enthusiast. As the Technology & Digital Lead (CTO) at Youth Buildup Community (YBC) and Co-founder & CEO at Shongjojon, I build tech solutions, real-world projects, and AI-powered tools. I create games, SaaS systems, machine learning applications, and innovative digital products.

content.html:
Featured Projects
